text: The provision in II, part 4 of the designation of 24 April will read as follows:

The aforementioned educational institutions must take careful measures to limit the risk of contamination, including keeping a distance of 1.5 meters between all persons present in these institutions (as much as possible for secondary special education in special circumstances.
2.The prohibition referred to in the first paragraph applies to air traffic from the following countries that pose a high risk in the spread of the virus that causes COVID-19:e. Spain;
With regard to this prohibition, the 1.5 meters in the public space is enforced from three people.
The measures will be reconsidered no later than April 28.
2.The prohibition referred to in the first paragraph applies to air traffic from the following countries that pose a high risk in the spread of the virus that causes COVID-19:d. South Korea;
In this assignment I have processed and adapted the previous instructions that I have provided to all chairpersons of the security region.
Article 1 (definition)In these regulations the following terms have the following meanings:
The chairman of the security region ensures that municipalities draw up an area approach for catering concentration areas to prevent great crowds and influx in these areas.
For the measures mentioned under 4 to 7 inclusive, you can make provision in the emergency ordinance, so that action under that ordinance is possible if necessary.

B.The prohibition on gatherings in the instruction of April 24, part I, part 2, will read as follows:2. Gatherings of more than thirty persons, excluding staff, in buildings open to the public and associated yards and in enclosed places, with the exception of houses, are prohibited.

Having heard the advice of the Outbreak Management Team and the Administrative Coordination Consultation of 12 March 2020, the Ministerial CommitteeCrisis management decided on March 15, 2020 that from March 16, 2020 to April 6, 2020, no educational activities and no care may be provided in educational institutions and accommodation for childcare and childminders, with some exceptions described below.
A food and drink facility that also has a dance floor may remain open, provided the dance floor is closed.
- the organization of distance education, whereby students and pupils receive education in the home situation via a (digital) medium;
The partial ban on opening child and out-of-school care will also lapse.
Schools for special secondary education and others can open completely again.
I order you to suspend all events with more than 100 people in your area from March 13 to March 31, 2020.
